editorMode.description: what we should show in the editor

exemplar.description: Execute an additional query to identify interesting raw samples relevant for the given expr

expr.description: The actual expression/query that will be evaluated by Prometheus

instant.description: Returns only the latest value that Prometheus has scraped for the requested time series

intervalFactor.description:
@deprecated Used to specify how many times to divide max data points by. We use max data points under query options
See https://github.com/grafana/grafana/issues/48081

legendFormat.description: Series name override or template. Ex. {{hostname}} will be replaced with label value for hostname

range.description: Returns a Range vector, comprised of a set of time series containing a range of data points over time for each time series
